title: MicrosoftFabricConnection
description: Microsoft Fabric Warehouse and Lakehouse Connection Config

hostPort.title: Host and Port
hostPort.description: Host and port of the Microsoft Fabric SQL endpoint (e.g., your-workspace.datawarehouse.fabric.microsoft.com:1433).

database.title: Database
database.description: Database of the data source. This is the name of your Fabric Warehouse or Lakehouse. This is optional parameter, if you would like to restrict the metadata reading to a single database. When left blank, OpenMetadata Ingestion attempts to scan all the databases.

clientId.title: Client ID
clientId.description: Azure Application (client) ID for Service Principal authentication.

clientSecret.title: Client Secret
clientSecret.description: Azure Application client secret for Service Principal authentication.

tenantId.title: Tenant ID
tenantId.description: Azure Directory (tenant) ID for Service Principal authentication.

driver.title: Driver
driver.description: ODBC driver version in case of pyodbc connection.

ingestAllDatabases.title: Ingest All Databases
ingestAllDatabases.description: Ingest data from all databases (Warehouses and Lakehouses) in Microsoft Fabric. You can use databaseFilterPattern on top of this.

schemaFilterPattern.title: Default Schema Filter Pattern
schemaFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude schemas that matches the pattern.

tableFilterPattern.title: Default Table Filter Pattern
tableFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude tables that matches the pattern.

databaseFilterPattern.title: Default Database Filter Pattern
databaseFilterPattern.description: Regex to only include/exclude databases that matches the pattern.
